data.title: Hitachi Vantara Partner Program - Become a Partner
data.meta_description: Hitachi Vantara Partner Program empowers you to deliver cutting-edge solutions and drive success, all through the power of partnership. Talk to an expert.
data.text:
Hitachi Ops Center Accelerate Automation with AIOps. Drive IT agility, speed innovation and improve protection for your data infrastructure. Storage Software Transform your data infrastructure, creating a single data plane with storage virtualization and common management across data silos. Data Protection Achieve operational resilience in hybrid cloud with end-to-end data protection for workloads, apps and data across your ecosystem.

AI-ready Infrastructure and Solutions Hitachi iQ is the flagship AI portfolio from Hitachi, delivering extreme performance and resiliency at scale, with unified access to data wherever it is. Converged Infrastructure Elevate your private cloud infrastructure and run your most critical apps at scale with best-in-class performance and availability. Hyperconverged Infrastructure Modernize and simplify management across the data center and edge by consolidating workloads on a single turnkey system. Reference Architecture Optimize your cloud strategy with a single platform to power your private, hybrid or multicloud strategy with simplicity and efficiency.

SAP HANA Unmatched scalability for SAP HANA. Infrastructure that powers real-time data access and faster decision-making. Virtual Desktop (VDI) Unleash workspaces without borders with secure, flexible virtual desktops anywhere. Oracle Maximize the value of your Oracle applications and data so your business can move faster.

Hitachi iQ The flagship AI portfolio from Hitachi, delivering extreme performance and resiliency at scale, with unified access to data wherever it is. AI Operations Management Supercharge with AIOps. Speed up automation, analytics and security for peak IT efficiency.

Backup and Recovery Achieve operational resilience with comprehensive data protection coverage from one trusted partner. Ransomware Recovery Rapidly restore VMware environments with the world’s fastest ransomware recovery. Business Continuity Achieve the resiliency your business requires to keep operations running in case of disaster.

Certifications Validate your knowledge and expertise through exams in storage solutions architecture, implementation and administration. Training Level up your expertise. With our training program, you’re positioned to become a product or solution authority.

Infrastructure Orchestration as a Service Continuous insights, intelligence and automation, enterprise-wide with heterogeneous management. Storage as a Service Balance storage capacity, agility, cost-savings and risk reduction with agile pay-as-you-grow, cloud-managed storage services. Data Protection as a Service Achieve total data protection and business continuity with flexible, cloud-managed options for hybrid environments. Compute-as-a-Service World-class technology including managed Kubernetes containers, VMs and bare metal on demand without physical infrastructure investment. Hitachi EverFlex with Cisco Powered Hybrid Cloud Drive agility and optimize the value of your data with high-availability, consumption-based hybrid cloud solutions. Managed Services Optimize efficiency and cut TCO with a full suite of managed cloud, application, data infrastructure and storage services.

Brocade Be ready to grow with solutions built for speed, security, agility and scale. Cisco A proven partnership to modernize infrastructure to meet future needs. Commvault Optimize hybrid cloud with industry leading data protection and recovery. Veeam Innovate with robust solutions that protect, manage and optimize data. Veritas Deliver superior insight and availability and ensure trust and compliance. VMware Drive elasticity for modern workloads across VMware's entire ecosystem.

Amazon Web Services Harness the collective power of Hitachi Vantara + AWS. Optimize cloud services, accelerate application migration and drive innovation. Microsoft Azure A powerful alliance tailored to your cloud needs. Unlock innovation, resilience and scalability within your Microsoft environments. Google Cloud Through our partnership with Google Cloud, you can achieve consistent operations across clouds without sacrificing performance, security or compliance.
